text: More To The Moon tracks to celebrate its release on Switch ^^

text: Oh wow, I remember first playing this game and how I had this song on repeat for weeks. Such amazing memories :).

text: Esta melodia es muy linda y me llena de agradables emociones. Su repertorio es bastante bueno y extenso, gracias por compartir estas lindas melodias y quiero decir que su canal es increible. Saludos. ;)

text: This tune is absolutely fantastic.

text: I desperately want to to play this game now. This tune gives me goosebumps.

text: My god, I've never played this game but just this tune makes me want to cry.

text: That moment when you realize River only wanted Johnny to remember ...
author: GebouYeah

text: Hey SupraDarky. I've been a subscriber for quite some time, and never have I been more happy to be. Thank you so much for introducing me to this gem of a game. I promptly proceeded to buy it after researching the game once I heard this beautiful piece, and just beat it today. What a story.
author: JonoftheDead

text: I just finished this game too. Very sad but heartfelt. I'm amazed they put this kind of emotion in a 16-bit game. I guess that just goes to prove again that graphics matter, but nowhere near as much as story and music.
author: solandras666

text: Very depressing track.  (in a good way obviously)

text: Beautiful track.
author: LiangHuBBB

text: Haven't played this game. But the song is beautiful and I looked it up. I am compelled to play.
author: ShadowKinesis

text: When I started the game for the first time I seriously had a tear in my eye. It was that good.
author: Wynard

text: Ah yeah. Love this game. Love the music. Can't wait for the sequel.
author: boyblob

text: The only game to make me cry. Best played if you don't know anything about it, or the music beforehand.

text: The best theme of the game is "Everything's Alright ".
author: Boddy

text:
GOTY 2011

Well, maybe not, but it was still excellent.
author: xavier

text: Such a great game.
author: Vector

text: TWD also has a great soundtrack. You should definitely add one from it once you finished the game.
author: I, Dio!

text: This was simply amazing. The story was well thought out and all of the music went wonderfully with the scenes, set light, dark, and heart wrenching tones and the ending had me sobbing for the first time in what seems like almost 10 years now. The last time I cried this hard was when my first dog passed away. Thank you so much for uploading this piece~.
author: Sandwhale Gaming

text:
My advice to people who have not played this yet.
DO NOT WATCH A LET'S PLAY. You will not get even a quarter of the feeling you get from just playing and experiencing the story for yourself. This game has been greenlit in Steam recently. Just get the game and just play for yourself, you won't regret it.
author: thr3351

text: I don't know how I can get my hands on this game due to me having a bunch of retro systems, a Wii, and a PSP, but color me intrigued.  I love this song...
author: SMRPGFAN101

text: never heard of this game, but i'll have to look for it now. Such a beautiful theme.
author: allthatishere

text: How weird. I showed my friend who showed me your playlist this song just yesterday... Then again, I'm a prophet on a lot of things.
author: kaboissonneault

text: I was going to send you a mail to play this game coz it's story is amazing and the music is beautiful. But I guess you are one step ahead :)
author: TheQqmore

text: Excellent game.  Walking Dead is amazing as well, but prepare for some heartache.
author: LdjX1000

text: I've seen people say the gameplay was useless and that it should have just been a story to read. I disagree, even if you hardly had anything to do during the gameplay sequences, it's what helped make me feel like I took part in this story and care about the cast of characters. Anyways, I started The Walking Dead now, looks like I'm going for 2 greatly written and sad games in a row.
author: SupraDarky

text: I finished this game a couple days ago, took me about 4 hours. It feels longer though since it's a slow "game". It's really more of an interactive story. An awesome and emotional story. It got a lot of praise and I can now see why, it definitely stick with you. The beautiful music certainly helps. I remember liking this theme before playing the game, but now it holds a special place.
author: SupraDarky
